name: Rescue Mr. Penguin
description:
Rescue Mr. Penguin is a 2D Puzzle Game created for Ludum Dare 49.

Your are Mr. Penguin and you are trapped on a big block of ice swimming somewhere in the wide ocean. 

"Why trapped?" you may ask. Well Mr. Penguin has a tiny problem: he can't swim.

He has always been afraid of water since he was a little kid penguin.

But rescue is near! A ship has been sighted near the ice floe.

If you can make it to the ship you might escape.

The ice is very slippery and unstable though. You can't really stop once you

started moving. To stop you have to make use of your environment.

Use your ARROW KEYS or WASD to move around!

FYI: There is an ingame Pause Menu (ESC/PAUSE/SPACE Key while playing) where you can mute the music and restart or even skip a level.

CREDITS

- Music

Main Menu: Acrostics by Cityfires [https://opengameart.org/content/acrostics] Game: Caketown by Matthew Pablo [https://opengameart.org/content/caketown-cuteplayful] End Screen: Nature theme sketch by remaxim [https://opengameart.org/content/nature-theme-sketch]

- Graphics

Menu Backround: By Edurs Illustrations [https://pixabay.com/illustrations/snow-penguin-iceberg-arctic-6197832/] Penguin: https://de.cleanpng.com/png-bmzw4s/ Gravestone: https://de.cleanpng.com/png-bjz85w/

- Fonts

Ice Caps by The Font Nook [https://www.dafont.com/de/the-font-nook.d1411]

Ice Age by Florian Doyen [https://www.dafont.com/de/ice-age-font.font]

CHANGELOG
  • Fixed Level 20 because i didn’t worked as intended
  • Fixed Player being able to move while Level Screen was still showing
  • Pause Menu can now be opened via PAUSE and SPACE Keys aswell (ESC did not work in Fullscreen Web Version)
